reviewText: The sound track for Winter's Sonata was very memorable to listen to while watching the series. Even without the video to view, the music brings back the essence of the very key moments.

Received product on time in condition seller posted.  Glad to know there are still a few sellers out there with Integrity!

I have ordered products through Amazon.con from four of their sellers.  I got "burned" by two...Woody Jin (Winter Sonata 6 disc DVD set) and the seller of book (Always Wear Clean Underwear and Other Lessons My Mother Taught Me by Lillian Hinds). Buyers beware of these two sellers.

Beautiful music and beautiful images. A very good souvenir from the TV series with the same name. The translation from Koren language into English is useful in order to understand the lyrics of the main songs.
